name: Survive Outdoors Longer Emergency Blanket
description: Lightweight insurance that could help keep you alive if you get lost or injured. This Emergency Blanket reflects 90% of your body heat and has a high-visibility orange exterior.Vacuum-metalized polyethylene reflects 90% of your body heat and stretches without shredding like Mylar®.Waterproof and windproof.High-viz orange exterior.Resealable bag can be used to store the blanket.
